Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends Object
    Represents a Player for the War game. A Player simply has an array list of cards.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card getBottomCard()
      Returns the bottom card in the array list.
      ArrayList<Card> getDeck()
      The getDeck method returns the array list of cards the player currently has.
      Card getTopCard()
      Returns the second card in the array list.
      void moveCard()
      Moves a the first card in the pile to the back.
      void moveCards()
      Move the first two cards in the array list to the back.
      void remove()
      Removes the first two cards in the array list.

    • Method Detail

      • getDeck

        public ArrayList<Card> getDeck()
        The getDeck method returns the array list of cards the player currently has.

      • getTopCard

        public Card getTopCard()
        Returns the second card in the array list. Utility method for when a war occurs.

      • getBottomCard

        public Card getBottomCard()
        Returns the bottom card in the array list.

      • remove

        public void remove()
        Removes the first two cards in the array list. Utility method for when a war occurs and the player loses.

      • moveCards

        public void moveCards()
        Move the first two cards in the array list to the back. Utility function for when a war occurs and the player wins.

      • moveCard

        public void moveCard()
        Moves a the first card in the pile to the back.
